00011 #include "RigidDisplaceMove.h"
00012 #include <mcMd/simulation/Simulation.h>
00013 #include <mcMd/mcSimulation/McSystem.h>
00014 #include <mcMd/mcSimulation/mc_potentials.h>
00015 #include <mcMd/species/Species.h>
00016 #include <util/boundary/Boundary.h>
00017 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Molecule.h>
00018 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Atom.h>
00019 #include <util/space/Dimension.h>
00020 #include <util/global.h>
00021 
00022 namespace McMd
00023 {
00024 
00025    using namespace Util;
00026 
00027    /* 
00028    * Constructor
00029    */
00030    RigidDisplaceMove::RigidDisplaceMove(McSystem& system) 
00031     : SystemMove(system),
00032       delta_(0.0),
00033       speciesId_(-1)
00034    {}
00035    
00036    /* 
00037    * Read speciesId and delta.
00038    */
00039    void RigidDisplaceMove::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00040    {
00041       readProbability(in);
00042       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00043       read<double>(in, "delta", delta_);
00044       readBlank(in);
00045 
00046       nAtom_ = simulation().species(speciesId_).nAtom();
00047       oldPositions_.allocate(nAtom_);
00048    }
00049    
00050    /* 
00051    * Generate, attempt and accept or reject a rigid molecule translation.
00052    */
00053    bool RigidDisplaceMove::move() 
00054    { 
00055       Vector    oldPos, newPos, dr;
00056       double    newEnergy, oldEnergy;
00057       Molecule* molPtr;
00058       Atom*     atomPtr;
00059       int       iAtom, j;
00060 
00061       incrementNAttempt();
00062 
00063       // Choose a molecule at random
00064       molPtr = &(system().randomMolecule(speciesId_));
00065 
00066       // Calculate current energy and store old positions.
00067       // Ignore covalent bonding energy, because it won't change.
00068       oldEnergy = 0.0;
00069       for (iAtom = 0; iAtom < nAtom_; ++iAtom) {
00070          atomPtr = &molPtr->atom(iAtom);
00071          oldPositions_[iAtom] = atomPtr->position();
00072          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00073          oldEnergy += system().pairPotential().atomEnergy(*atomPtr);
00074          #endif
00075          #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00076          oldEnergy += system().externalPotential().atomEnergy(*atomPtr);
00077          #endif
00078          #ifdef INTER_TETHER
00079          oldEnergy += system().atomTetherEnergy(*atomPtr);
00080          #endif
00081       }
00082 
00083       // Generate trial displacement Vector dr
00084       for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00085          dr[j] = random().uniform(-delta_, delta_);
00086       }
00087 
00088       // Move every atom by dr and calculate new trial energy.
00089       newEnergy = 0.0;
00090       for (iAtom = 0; iAtom < nAtom_; ++iAtom) {
00091          atomPtr = &molPtr->atom(iAtom);
00092          atomPtr->position() += dr;
00093          boundary().shift(atomPtr->position());
00094          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00095          newEnergy += system().pairPotential().atomEnergy(*atomPtr);
00096          #endif
00097          #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00098          newEnergy += system().externalPotential().atomEnergy(*atomPtr);
00099          #endif
00100          #ifdef INTER_TETHER
00101          newEnergy += system().atomTetherEnergy(*atomPtr);
00102          #endif
00103       }
00104 
00105       // Decide whether to accept the move
00106       bool accept = random().metropolis(boltzmann(newEnergy - oldEnergy));
00107 
00108       if (accept) {
00109    
00110          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00111          // Update cell
00112          for (iAtom = 0; iAtom < nAtom_; ++iAtom) {
00113             system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(molPtr->atom(iAtom));
00114          }
00115          #endif
00116 
00117          incrementNAccept();
00118 
00119       } else {
00120    
00121          // Return atoms to original positions
00122          for (iAtom = 0; iAtom < nAtom_; ++iAtom) {
00123             molPtr->atom(iAtom).position() = oldPositions_[iAtom];
00124          }
00125    
00126       }
00127       return accept;
00128    }
00129 
00130 }      
00131 #endif
